pageContext.claim: “We haven't been there [at 3 percent growth] real -- we haven't been there in a long time, it's been a long time. As you know the previous administration didn't hit it for the year for eight years. In eight years it didn't hit it at all.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is celebrating hitting 3 percent gross domestic product growth in a quarter but, contrary to his claim, Obama hit 3 percent or higher in eight separate quarters.
